name: Spin Guy
description:
Spin your bat around to knock out enemies and stay alive as long as possible

Controls - WASD / Click and drag

Just wanted to make a quick and simple idea I had. All suggestions are welcome since this is just a simple prototype to test an idea.

All assets taken from  www.kenney.nl

Music - https://www.playonloop.com/2018-music-loops/lone-wolf/
